alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 6:06PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cook, southeastern Berrien, Lanier, Lowndes, east central Thomas and Brooks Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 606 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Adel to Boston. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Lakeland, Adel, Valdosta, Quitman, Hahira, Sparks, Boston, Ray City, Pavo, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Morven, Barwick, Cecil, Barretts, New Lois and Massee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
